description:
Обязанности: 

  • to develop and prototype key application components; 
  • to develop server and UI modules in multilayered project; 
  • to work closely with business users and analysts to clarify and estimate business requirements and coordinate with other teams' requirements and projects; 
  • to carry out routine code review; 

Требования:
  • experience with J2SE, J2EE, Spring, JPS/Hibernate, JSP/Servlets, EJB3, GWT/GXT;
  • experience with Weblogic and Tomcat application servers; 
  • experience with PL/SQL is a plus; 
  • experience with CVS/Subversion, Eclipse and Maven;
  • experience with multithreaded Java applications;
  • experience with JUnit; 
  • strong analytical and problem solving skills; 
  • excellent technical design skills - writing technical design documents; 
  • very good team player; 
  • excellent communication and interpersonal skills;  
  • customer focused work; 
  • spoken English. 

Условия:
  • официальное трудоустройство согласно ТК РФ;
  • оформление полиса добровольного медицинского страхования (ДМС) на сотрудника и членов его семьи;
  • компенсация фитнеса;
  • бесплатное обучение в собственном Учебном Центре компании;
  • корпоративные скидки на различные виды страхования и кредитования.
name: Senior Java developer
